text: Nihsandeha tomadera prabhu hacchena allah yini srsti karechena mahakasamandala o prthibi chaya dine, takhana tini arase adhisthita hana. Tini dinake abrta karena ratri diye, -- ya dratagatite tara anusarana kare. Ara surya o candra o naksatraraji tamra hukumera ajnadhina. Srsti kara o nirdesa dana ki tamra adhikarabhukta naya? Mahimamaya allah -- bisbajagatera prabhu
